code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';export function Map(){var ref=useRef();useEffect(function(){var apikey='key=AIzaSyBzyYXRoJ4DmJBRgcDzPHDOpDN-MMyRgZ0';var script=document.createElement('script');script.src='https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?'+apikey;document.head.appendChild(script);script.addEventListener('load',function(){createGoogleMap();});});var createGoogleMap=function createGoogleMap(){var shop={lat:-33.927444,lng:151.047991};var map=new window.google.maps.Map(ref.current,{zoom:16,center:shop});var marker=new window.google.maps.Marker({map:map,position:shop,title:"865 Punchbowl Road, Punchbowl",animation:window.google.maps.Animation.DROP});var infoWindow=new window.google.maps.InfoWindow({content:"865 Punchbowl Rd, Punchbowl"});marker.addListener('click',function(){infoWindow.open(map,marker);});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{ref:ref,style:{width:'80%',height:'400px',color:'black'}});}
